lines.text: Pardon me, officers. But don't we get a last request.
Ok. But when the smoke is finished, so are you.

[surprised to see all the watches on his arm]
Hey, what's the idea of the 3 watches?
That's the way I tell the time.
This one runs 10 minutes slow every 2 hours. This one's 20 minutes fast every 4 hours. The one in the middle's broken, it stopped at 2 o'clock.
Well how do you tell the time?
I take the 10 minutes on this one, and subtract it from the 20 minutes on this one, haha, then I divide by 2 in the middle.
Well, what time is it now?

[takes a stopwatch from his pocket]
Oh uh, 10 minutes to 4...
Calling all cars! Calling all cars! Be on the lookout for three photographers... they ain't in here!
You shoot the picture! Now we shoot you!
